message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL

The paper proposes an automated patent landscaping model based on deep learning, which involves analyzing the text and metadata of patents. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, including:

- cs.CL (Computation and Language): This sub-category covers natural language processing and computational linguistics, which are relevant to the text analysis component of the proposed model.
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval): This sub-category covers search and retrieval of information, which is relevant to the patent querying and dataset creation process.
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): This sub-category covers various aspects of machine learning, which is the overarching methodology used in the proposed model.
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): This sub-category covers a broad range of topics related to AI, including natural language processing and machine learning, which are relevant to the proposed model.
- cs.DL (Deep Learning): This sub-category specifically focuses on deep learning, which is the main technique used in the proposed model.
